TopicTitle: "Previous Stable Release" in steam installs 0.90 instead of 1.0

Articles.Content: I selected "Previous Stable Release" in Steam, expecting it to install 1.0. Steam installed the previous beta release (0.90) instead. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
